amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws which establish standards for the education or safety of students in elementary or secondary public schools.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of two amendments, offered en bloc, to exempt from the provisions of the bill those laws and regulations establishing standards for the education or safety of students in elementary or secondary public schools. (Text of the amendment was printed as amendment Nos. 151 and 152 in the Congressional Record of January 20, 1995.).

action.text: On agreeing to the Fields (LA) amendments (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 282 (Roll no. 72).
